privates.name: Bödelibahn
privates.description: Once in the game, a company may place an additional yellow track tile according to the rules. Either that company or it's director must be the owner of the P2. Turn over the certificate after use.

privates.name: Furka - Oberalpbahn
privates.description: The owner of this Private Railway company may at any time place the Furka-Oberalp special tiles. This is an additional tile lay and free of cost.

privates.name: Compagnie Montreaux - Montbovon
privates.description: Comes with a 10% share of the MOB. This share can't be sold unless the director's share of the MOB was bought and hence an issue price determined.

privates.name: Societa Ananima Delle Ferrovie
privates.description: Comes with the director's share of the FNM. The P6 owner sets the issue price for the FNM. The P6 will be closed as soon as the FNM runs a train on a route for the first time.

privates.name: Lokfabrik Oerlikon
privates.description: The P7 will be closed as soon as a 5 or 5H train is bought. The owner of the P7 gets the 5H train named "EVA". He may give it immediately or later to any company he's the director of. Train limits have to be kept.

notes.note: Shares in the market pay dividends to the corporation
No more than 50% of a corporation's shares may be in the market at any time
Shares cannot be sold during the first stock round

legend.description: Shares of this corporation do not count toward the certificate limit
Players may own more than 60% of this corporation
Players may purchase any number of shares of this corporation in one stock action
